dataSet.name: CashFlows

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN Account = VALUE(ChartOfAccounts.ChartOfAccounts.EmptyRef) THEN " Unapplied cash payment income" ELSE " " + Account.Code + " " + Account.Description END

calculatedField.expression: CASE WHEN Account = VALUE(ChartOfAccounts.ChartOfAccounts.EmptyRef) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

parameter.name: BeginOfFiscalYear
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN MONTH(&Period.EndDate) >= Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() THEN DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.EndDate) - 1) ELSE DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.EndDate) - 2) END

parameter.dcsat:name: DiffPercent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN (AmountRCTurnoverPP IS NULL) OR (AmountRCTurnoverPP = 0) THEN 0 ELSE (ISNULL(-AmountRCTurnover, 0) / ISNULL(-AmountRCTurnoverPP, 0) - 1) * 100 END

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: DiffPercent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN (AmountRCTurnoverPP IS NULL) OR (AmountRCTurnoverPP = 0) THEN 0 ELSE (ISNULL(-AmountRCTurnover, 0) / ISNULL(-AmountRCTurnoverPP, 0) - 1) * 100 END

parameter.dcsat:name: TextTitle
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN TextTitle = "" THEN "R&D (Purple report)" ELSE TextTitle END
